title: Top European Launch Companies of 2024
summary:
Another year without a first orbital flight aboard a commercially developed European rocket. That being said, 2024 was, nonetheless, a significant year for European launch companies. The two most notable achievements were the return of the Vega C rocket to operational flight and the inaugural flight of the Ariane 6 rocket. As with last year, […]
